FuncDef: The display fwm vlan statistics command displays VLAN resource statistics. The display fwm vlan statistics command displays VLAN resource statistics.
CLIs: display fwm vlan statistics [ slot <slot-id> | ipc | resource-apply ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a Slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays statistics about IPC connections,disconnections and messages.
-
